price: 4. Nous n’avons détruit aucune cité sans qu’elle n’ait eu son terme écrit et déjà su.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
